name: Solar System (itch) (andresnavag93)
description:
This is my System Solar project, I added the following planets:

  • Sun
  • Mercury
  • Venus
  • Earth
  • Mars
  • Jupiter
  • Saturn
  • Uranus
  • Neptune

Instructions

  • Camera default target: 
    • Sun Planet
  • Mouse Left Click on any Planet:
    •  The camera will follow the planet clicked
  • Right Click: 
    • The camera will follow the sun

Credits

Created By Andres Navarro
